name: HEX-CONNECT
description:
HEX-CONNECT

A game made in 8 days for the Lost Relic Games 2022 Game Jam
https://itch.io/jam/lost-relic-games-1

The theme was "Connection" and this is what we went for:
In Hex-Connect, you play as a hex and as you move from node to node you will connect theses nodes. Your goal is to do this as quickly as possible and to not fail the level by going too slow - you do this by boosting correctly at the right time.

A cool shape will be drawn via your connections - make sure to complete the final level :)

NOTE - Apologies for the horrible sound effect bug (It's a WEBGL bug as it didnt happen in unity, and we haven't had time to fix and are unsure of the cause)
